text: Allaha nai ho, jasale dharatiharula'i timro nimti basako tha'um ra akasala'i chana banayo ra timila'i rupa diyo ra rupaharu pani kati ramro banayo ra timila'i paka (pavitra) kuraharu khanako nimti diyo. Yahi allaha timro palanakarta ho. Tasartha bada kalyanakari cha allaha, sampurna jagatako palanakarta
